definitions.text: direct or control; projects, businesses, etc.
examples: She is running a relief operation in the Sudan
The washing machine won't go unless it's plugged in
Does this old car still run well?
This old radio doesn't work anymore
do not operate machinery after imbibing alcohol

definitions.text: perform a movement in military or naval tactics in order to secure an advantage in attack or defense

examples: What is going on in the minds of the people?
The doctors operated on the patient but failed to save his life
